alert.note: Alert for Johnson; Miami (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 23 at 3:59PM CDT until September 23 at 4:30PM CDT by NWS Kansas City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Pleasant Hill has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Miami County in east central Kansas... Southeastern Johnson County in east central Kansas... Northwestern Cass County in west central Missouri... Southwestern Jackson County in west central Missouri... * Until 430 PM CDT. * At 359 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Spring Hill, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * Locations impacted include... Overland Park, Olathe, Leawood, Grandview, Belton, Prairie Village, Raymore, Gardner, Spring Hill, Peculiar, Cleveland, Chiles, Bucyrus, Stillwell, Stanley and Clare. This includes the following highways... Interstate 35 in Kansas between mile markers 208 and 217. Interstate 435 between mile markers 73 and 80. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
